title: I finally just got to Diamond 1 (repost)
body:
Just wanted to post it somewhere PUBLIC because I literally struggled for two days going in and out of promos five times and I finally did it ugh yes

I love you all, and just a reminder that Miss Fortune is broken. ^_^ <3

(reposted cuz i put this in the wrong category so it was deleted and i want more attention even though diamond 1 isnt that special ever since masters happened thank you)

replies.body: Congrats on diamond 1, I just played a game earlier vs a miss fortune 1 hour long and we won because her ult was hitting like a marshmallow, guess she didn't build properly lol.
